I also get this error when using XUpdate.  It occurs when I try running the
addressbook example update.  However, if I comment out the remove clause, the
update works fine.  It also works fine if the remove clause's select does not
match any records.

Here is my stack trace:

Please submit to the xindice-users list.  If you don't get help there, then 
submit to xindice-dev.

We are working on 1.1, which does not use corba.  You will probably have 
better luck trying to use the version from cvs head.
